attributes.review:
I download this app because I saw a five star review promising a perfect body and a long lasting relationship, neither of which happened.
I came to downloading this app with the mindset of a new me, which I was harshly let down.
attributes.title: This app is untruthful

attributes.review: before downloading the app i was told that harry styles would arrive at my front door and take me to europe, as an avid harry styles and 1D fan i was thrilled! but come to show i have downloaded the app and no harry 😔😔 thanks for nothing
attributes.title: false promises 😤😤

attributes.review: App is awfully created, takes days to download and has bugs left and right. do not download this app
attributes.title: awful

attributes.review: I tried downloading the app and it didn’t work but then my white friend downloaded it and it worked perfectly fine so in my opinion that kinda seems racist to me. GEN Z you’re a baddie without the bad 🧚🏻🧚🏻✨✨✨✨
attributes.title: Raecist

attributes.review: The app is not helpful, is only filled with lies and propaganda. Frankly I don’t understand how the App Store allows such trash. I have been an Apple customer for years and don’t understand how such filth and disgusting things are allowed.
attributes.title: Worst App Ever

attributes.review: You can’t take away tik tok for no reason that’s just plain stupid what else are we supposed to do sense we can’t hang out with friends! Are they planning on making a new app? Trump tok? 🤢
attributes.title: He can’t take it away

attributes.review: this app stole all my information as soon as i opened it and say the lil oompa loompa😍 it kept crashing my phone and opening other apps, horrible app, on top of that his face is everywhere!!’ who would want to see him! ALSO HE IS TAKING DOWN TIKTOK WHAT AM I GOING TO DOOOOO
attributes.title: horrible

attributes.review: I wanted to see what this app was all about and I downloaded and opened it, come to find out it’s completely disorganized and not finished. I do not advise you to download it.
attributes.title: Absolutely disappointed

attributes.review: got this app cause #Trump2020 but when i signed up and stuff it hacked my phone very mad also made my phone glitch up when i had it open and closed
attributes.title: not good

attributes.review: Opened the app and was kicked out I restarted my phone kicked me again! I closed my apps out and you will never guess what happened. It kicked me out! So many bugs with this app!
attributes.title: Terrible
